F. 0.3 percent

G. 0.5 percent

H. 5 percent

I. 0.02 percent

J. 0.05 percent

F. 0.3 percent

G. 0.5 percent

I. 0.02 percent

G. 0.5 percent

H. 5 percent

I. 0.02 percent

J. 0.05 percent
